name: injectable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
put into the body using a needle and syringe (= small tube): This injectable medication contains adrenaline, which reverses the effects of a serious allergic reaction.

a drug that can be put into the body using a needle and syringe (= small tube): In the last 10 years or so, injectables have become so much easier to use for diabetic patients. The clinic can offer contraceptives such as birth control pills, contraceptive patches, or injectables.
